title: Installation issue: CMake@3.13.0
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

I'm trying to install `cmake@3.13.0` into an environment. Here's the environment's `spack.yaml`:
```
spack:
  # add package specs to the `specs` list
  specs: [openmpi, hdf5, cmake, parmetis]
  view:
    default:
      root: /Users/mayr/utils/spack/var/spack/environments/trilinos_gcc9-2-0/.spack-env/view
      projections: {}
  mirrors: {}
  repos: []
  upstreams: {}
  modules:
    enable: []
  definitions: []
  packages:
    all:
      compiler: [gcc]
      buildable: true
      version: []
      providers: {}
      paths: {}
      modules: {}
  config: {}
```

The compiler is gcc 9.2.0 installed via HomeBrew.

Here's the spec for cmake:
```console
$ spack env activate <environementName>
$ spack add cmake@3.13.0
$ spack concretize
==> Concretized cmake

[+]  2v32hda                  ^readline@7.0%gcc@9.2.0 arch=darwin-mojave-x86_64
[+]  nqrazzo          ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@9.2.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=darwin-mojave-x86_64
```

### Platform and user environment

**OS:** Mac OS Mojave Version 10.14.6
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Darwin poseidon 18.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.7.0: Thu Jun 20 18:42:21 PDT 2019; root:xnu-4903.270.47~4/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
``` 

**`packages.yaml`**
```
packages:
  cmake:
    version: [3.13.0]
  openmpi:
    version: [3.1.4]
```

**`compilers.yaml`**
```
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: mojave
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/clang
      cxx: /usr/bin/clang++
      f77: /usr/local/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/local/bin/gfortran

      f77: /usr/local/bin/gfortran-9
      fc: /usr/local/bin/gfortran-9
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    target: x86_64
```
